title: There's a live-action Diablo ad from the director of Marvel's Eternals that's way too serious for its own good
description: You gotta get goofy with it.

title: Travel back in time to fight zombies and tyranny in this upcoming survival shooter that's looking for beta testers right now
description: There's a lot going on in The Front, but it looks weird enough that it might be interesting.

title: Rising Storm studio Antimatter Games is being closed
description: Parent company EG7 is looking to cut expenses and "achieve higher predictability and profitability."

title: Homeworld 3 is delayed to 2024
description: Blackbird Interactive wants more time to ensure it meets the "iconic" standard set by the previous Homeworld games.

title: 'Marathon' this, 'Spider-Man' that, as far as I'm concerned the real PlayStation Showcase showstopper was the years-in-the-making follow-up to the most autumnal game of all time
description: Penciling in an appointment to have my heart broken by Revenant Hill.

title: Will Smith finally picked a game to star in, and... it's a free-to-play survival shooter?
description: Granted it's from the makers of PUBG Mobile, but I guess I expected more from one of the biggest stars in the world.

title: My highlight of Sony's PlayStation showcase is, you guessed it, coming to PC
description: Phantom Blade: Zero looks like Sekiro on a drunken night out.

title: There's no greater shame in an RPG than leaving character creation and finding out you're accidentally hideous
description: I spend an hour perfecting this face and then the first cutscene destroys me.

title: There's a slim chance Alan Wake 2 could get a physical release after all: The original Alan Wake PC publisher wants to make it happen
description: Nordic published the PC release of Alan Wake, and has offered to do it again for the sequel.

title: With 2 new missions, I'm ready to jump back into Warhammer 40K: Darktide
description: Fatshark has slowly been patching up Darktide, and now it's time to expand.

title: Realms of Ruin is a fast, accessible RTS that wants to bring Warhammer's newest setting to PC gamers: 'It's about getting in there and sticking your axe into the guy's face'
description: It's the first big-budget game to release in the world of Age of Sigmar, and developer Frontier has huge ambitions for it.

title: Fallout: New Vegas is free on the Epic Store for the first time ever
description: The week-long giveaway includes Fallout: New Vegas and all expansions and content packs.

title: Best footballer in the world says it's 'embarrassing' but he relaxes by playing Minecraft
description: That's not embarrassing, Erling.

title: Lego 2K Drive review
description: A solid kart racer enhanced by the ability to build your own Lego vehicles—but its greedy microtransactions are a brick too far.

title: WoW Classic players furious at addition of controversial item, Blizzard says it's a necessary evil in the 'unwinnable war' against bots, scammers, and RMT workshops
description: "It’s an arms race, and it never, ever ends."

title: Sony's upcoming game streaming handheld looks like someone stretched a Dualsense controller out with a rolling pin
description: Project Q is in the works, but Sony's keeping quiet about the majority of the specs.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum review
description: This stealth adventure has its charms, despite a fractured identity.

title: The only racing game series I've ever cared about has hit the 5 million player milestone, now bring on the dubstep
description: Trackmania 2020 is a fun game, but it's not dubstep-y enough or wobble bass-y enough.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum reviews round-up: lots of folk are saying they hates it
description: Gollum hasn't taken a beating like this since he pissed off Samwise.

title: Just one person showed up to buy an RTX 4060 Ti for its late night Akihabara launch
description: Two stores opened late in Japan's Akihabara district for the event, but it's become painfully clear they wasted their money.

title: Nvidia doesn't care if you don't like its new graphics cards, AI is going to make it $11B in just 3 months
description: Say what you like, gaming isn't the big thing for Jen-Hsun and co. right now.

title: Take-Two CEO says GTA 6 'needs to be something you've never seen before' a year after leaks where it looked like something we've seen before
description: Oh, is that all?

title: How to watch Warhammer Skulls 2023
description: Catch the latest reveals and Warhammer game news from the annual showcase.

title: Computex is a different beast to E3 and it's back for real in 2023!
description: Some trade shows are still relevant.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #705: Thursday, May 25
description: Help with the #705 puzzle if you need it.

title: Every PC game announcement from PlayStation's 2023 summer showcase
description: The good news: nearly everything is coming to PC (eventually).

title: How is AI going to change game development?
description: Developers from Hardspace Shipbreaker studio Blackbird Interactive talk about the realistic possibilities of AI in gaming.

title: Metal Gear Solid 3's remake announcement can't hold a candle to one of the best game trailers of all time
description: Metal Gear Solid 3's original reveal remains an untouched masterpiece.
